org.mitre.taxii.util

Class Validation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.taxii.util.Validation

  • public final class Validation
extends java.lang.Object
    Validation results that keeps track of all warnings, errors, and fatal errors as strings. Inspired by SAX's ErrorHandler interface.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Validation()
